name: Days In Winter
description:
This game was made for Chill Jam 2023.

During a zombie apocalypse, you find yourself in a snow storm. Cut down trees, shoot zombies, get past the waves, and always remember to stay near your campfire.

|| CONTROLS ||

WASD TO MOVE.

RMB: Carry Fireplace.

LMB: Shoot & Place blocks.

Swing Axe to cut down trees.
